title: Jesse Korman from The Number 12 Looks Like You
itunes:title: Jesse Korman from The Number 12 Looks Like You
description:
Hope you are staying INSIDE and safe! We have another great discussion to bring you this week to keep you company (or distracted). Jesse Korman is the vocalist from The Number 12 Looks Like You, a tech/art/metal/whatever you want to call them band. I remember trying to sign the band when I was working at Century Media Records and Jesse always had a very distinct vision for the band, which I admired. We discuss his early life, the hustle it takes to keep a band around and pursuing his creative outlets. Enjoy!

Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
